name: VNGenerateObjectnessBasedSaliencyImageRequest
desc: A request that generates a heat map that identifies the parts of an image most likely to represent objects.

items.name: var results: [VNSaliencyImageObservation]?
items.desc: The results of the image saliency request.

items.name: let VNGenerateObjectnessBasedSaliencyImageRequestRevision1: Int
items.desc: Revision 1 of the image saliency request.
